Name: Trivia Tricks
About the game: Play Online or Local Multiplayer! Play Trivia in online multiplayer with up to 8 players or connect controllers and smartphones to play locally with up to four friends. Trivia Tricks is the most customizable trivia game on Steam! You can play either competitively or co-operatively against trivia bosses, choose your optional bonuses or risk your points in the high-stakes Chance Round! Alternatively, keep it traditional and have knowledge trump all. Tons of Categories! With over 5,000 questions across 13 categories from trivia classics (Music, Geography, Film & TV) to more niche subjects (Video Games and Anime), Trivia Tricks has something for everyone! Veto any categories you donâ€™t want to play and download new user-created question packs in one click through Steam Workshop! We're constantly updating our library of hand-crafted questions with new additions, including suggestions from our community, so you'll need to draw on a ton of facts to keep up with the competition! Create a Character! On top of showing off your big brain, let everyone know you can accessorize too! Unlock cosmetics through achievements and let everyone know that you're one smart cookie before the game has even started.
